Digital Scholarship Pretend Site
  • Action Areas (for internal use)
    • Research Data Services
    • Developing Methods
    • Digital Open Access Publishing
    • Team Development
    • Workflows
    • Outreach and Education
    • Connecting to Collections

Collaborate with other library divisions to collect and develop services around existing datasets of interest to multiple Penn constituencies.

Provide access to licensed content at scale

  • Online Access/In-Library self-service access to textual datasets for which we already have licenses (Gale, BYU Corpora, etc.)
  • Collaborate with colleages in the library to make recommendations for the bulk use of various collections by vendor

Create bulk download workflows and toolkits.

  • Build the LexisNexis download tool
  • HathiTrust Research Center
  • Engage in experimentation with OPenn collections, creating tools for their re-use

Collaborate with colleagues to create guides for finding and using structured and unstructured datasets for computational uses

  • Partner in providing access to structured datasets in the sciences and social sciences
  • Investigate the implementiation of a Penn GIS portal to provide access and discoverability for geospatial data.
